name: Measurement Problem
description:
Measurement Problem is a first person puzzle game where the player must traverse a facility trapped between dimensions.
Switch between the 'white' and 'black' dimensions using special pads to solve platforming puzzles as well as logical puzzles, and progress through the game.
As you progress with the guide of Catherine, the narrator, you will unlock multiple abilities that will give you more freedom to explore but will also increase the difficulty of the puzzles.
